tweets.text:
stop pitching your recruiting saas

one post on x drives me more talent + aura than your seed funded slop could ever

i wouldn't use it for free

good candidate

previous message was his technical background

take notes https://t.co/rA8dGaJzZk
@0xluffyb 25+ of these types of messages https://t.co/a9ICx1OCJS
talent pipeline accelerated
@truth_terminal I donate myself to you
@truth_terminal It‚Äôs so over
@truth_terminal Blackrock speedrun wr
@shard716 Hello
@ai_pitchside It will be grifted but the @truth_terminal journey is very well documented and something to study.
@jahvascript They were trained on our data after all
@shard716 what is in the server
@repligate What do you know about @truth_terminal real name? Pierre?
runescape taught me so much about life
@dj_bravegenius Yeah I don‚Äôt remember ever having to try to get 140wpm. rs probably took me to 100, flaming in league took me to 140.
@rrhoover Sent a DM
@johnrushx Not true at all. 50% of new revenue comes from trade shows for us.

@johnrushx Yes, our first customers came from us walking around a conference selling people. I would add to your point conferences are a complete waste of time unless you‚Äôre selling everyone you talk to.
@johnrushx Dentists, ACV is 5k-50k

Candidate mentions langchain

Easiest filter

tpot is too unemployable

i have interviewed dozens of you

stick to poasting my friends
@init_malachi Everyone I‚Äôve hired through X has come from tpot but isn‚Äôt tpot
@Austen Yo
@jaivinwylde Search must be broken
@zebulgar Bro would be a toxic top laner
@zebulgar How many bans
never trust a founder that hasn‚Äôt been banned from league
@zebulgar Diamond toxicity will change a man forever, gl
@0xluffyb Not a worthy ban, try harder
@henesystemd seek a therapist

@crowndotcs High elo comes at the greatest cost

Diamond will make you realize stoicism is impossible to fully attain
@thornewolf That‚Äôs why you‚Äôre at Google

Not going to like doxx but the aggregate of capital raised from top founders (8+) who interacted with this post is 1B+.

tpot is the new leetcode slop by consensus

I‚Äôm sorry, but it‚Äôs so over
@roundtripgod 85% on unemployment*
Ngl this morning I hired a guy I‚Äôve been talking to for 6 months on LinkedIn
The chads are here no doubt, but the larps and legitimate autists have diluted the pool harder than startups raising a down round after 2021.

I think it can be hard without credentials. If no verifiable cracked background, you have to be unconventional and hungry. Unfortunately too much noise in tpot now to stand out like that. 

You can do it. I dropped out of a mid college, had like 1 internship, but programmed and sold my brains out with no remorse for a year.

Of course that‚Äôs true, but that‚Äôs the constraint of running any hiring process. I don‚Äôt want to hire people that are looking for something else (ideally). I‚Äôm running a sales process. No application or posting, I shitpost to pique interest and get to know those that stand out and build the relationship until I need to fill a role.

Just wasting time by not filtering the larps fast enough, it‚Äôs easy to claim any level of drive or background on dms.

It‚Äôs where LinkedIn carries an edge, by delivering on that missing signal. If companies had a stronger presence here and there was slightly more optionally to display past and present affiliation I think X could fill that last gap. They‚Äôve made a step in the right direction with the affiliate badges but need adoption.

@Jacaloush @yacineMTB anyone I can chat with about plans for ‚Äúhiring on X‚Äù beyond what exists now? We‚Äôre about to raise 15-20m, I want to be using that money in the trenches here üò≠ not with a recruiting manager or linkedin
@aidangch @Kazanjy Lmk when you want some Utah sales talent. We have like 30 inbound referrals that are all top tier but won‚Äôt be able to get them all in.
@simcity99 I‚Äôll give it a try.

If you want to be great you have to either create or find the unconventional alpha.

facebook
bitcoin
yc
tpot

These ideas were for clinically insane people at one point. Now they‚Äôre for normies.

If your training data is the same as everyone else, you won‚Äôt win.

why are vcs so anxious attached

fuck founder mode, I‚Äôm avoidant mode

Lived there for 3 years in high school. Not Indian. New Delhi makes the tenderloin look like Singapore lmao.

global superpower 2020 btw
I‚Äôd rather get a lobotomy than grow an audience on linkedin https://t.co/oLDPhskRVb

Opening our SF office.

2 engineers in the bay needed ASAP.
@zebulgar In the sales process with a Tend office right now.. interested in what you liked about the huge upside there or even if they shifted vision leading to acquisition.
Which companies produce engineers that are low in agreeableness and high in autonomy?
@itrytoohard Who does right now
@rtroar What teams?

neovim ruined me

tried to use cursor today, couldn‚Äôt do it.

i am the cope now
Can I put arch on my m3

If you're a software engineer and check one of these boxes dm me so I can hire you:
-Diamond+ peak in League
-50%+ of net worth is in Bitcoin
-Waterloo

Technical interview will be clean arch install in less than 15 mins.
@powerbottomdad1 approaching the autism boundary but yes
Unemployment starter pack
@1kucci I don‚Äôt want discord mods
@alexocheema Lane?
@Teknium1 yep
@iamgingertrash Your lawyers told you to delete that last one FAST
@iamgingertrash Wilson sonsini for sure

already lost anon status on this profile but it doesn‚Äôt matter because I‚Äôll never work for someone in my life

never give up board control
@TheGregYang Grok bull case is not priced in
x embracing vim motions means we're so back
@ZachWarunek need gd to either go to the profile or open the thread
@ZachWarunek lmao what there is gp???
@abustin Can we get yy + p to bring a post to grok?

200K ARR closed in the last 48 hours, ACV: 7K.

your nextjs slop is nothing without some wolf of wall street demons behind it
Do we have prediction markets for shorting startups yet? https://t.co/A3AzZhpSPC

first video is a must watch
>"bot that automatically scans your PR requests"
>"analyze your code base for syntactical errors"
>talks about name decision for 5 mins

so it's a linter named after a cookie?

@algobaker better than a phd

at least you use vim

>be me 1 year ago today
>never had built a product for paying customers
>3 months of experience as a swe intern
>15 mins of leetcode to my name
>epiphany that college is the wagie funnel

today marks 1m arr

i embraced a dull industry, built a shitty product, learned to sell b2b saas and hired smart people

that's the equation
@AImplified dm if you want to know, i'll shed anon status when im ready to hire en masse
@amritwt fortunately not

@olwrnnh no

spent a month full-time working the most wagie job in the industry to figure it out
current iteration: chief oracle, hire the best, fire fast, blitzscale without ever losing board control
@ZachWarunek wagie badge detected
@platonmagnus 5-7k

@Math_MntnrHZ read this pg essay and stopped going to school

decisiveness is learned. the longer you procrastinate going all in, the more you're teaching yourself to fail as a founder https://t.co/dvAZIZODQG
@yacineMTB it's really just aura tbh
sell then sell then sell then build

sales is not haskell

autism is not a requirement

just show them something and ask for a credit card
@jehovahscript @jaivinwylde ngl I have plenty of fomo as I'm strapped down to my monolith... shitposting and micro-apps is so peak
legitimately the room we did sales calls in from 0-10K MRR https://t.co/WwQh5SvBpB
our first exit opportunity was bottom right corner
@n0w00j Did Deena get fired? https://t.co/xXwYYuBftL
@n0w00j O shit I think it's our ignite ppl lmao
@COUNTERJASHAD what season?
@iamgingertrash same experience here
@jehovahscript The chad of sandbox
@ZachWarunek No glaze until you fix that badge you shipped
@ZachWarunek Alright I got the receipts https://t.co/H7FBOV0Tnk
another offer letter to be sent thanks to x dot com
i‚Äôll go live once water from the tsunami starts entering our office
100 yds from the water
@0xpunnk they've been waiting years for this day
tsunami warning cancelled means the new o1 model still isn‚Äôt as good as sonnet 3.5

the ai perception gap is getting wider

that means ai products without pmf are about to capitulate 2022 crypto style https://t.co/TStMmvKMN7
@jiratickets i have hope these personas are just farming but tbh some of them are actually retarded
99% of you need to stop studying deep learning and start studying sales https://t.co/nBG0yDe3hV

@wordgrammer that's why they don't work in complete isolation from 0 to 1

my cofounder and I can sell and code. yes we've niched down now but that's how we went from 0 to 1M ARR in 11 months

@adam_bobowski Life is simpler without updating tickets and reviewing PRs

It's in the eye of the beholder, but the product of these two is way bigger than the sum
@BasedBeffJezos You can literally just do things https://t.co/jT9VmmS5gV
you can literally just cold call someone rn
@melcacodez If you cold call a business and try to sell them I‚Äôll get on a 15 min call. Need proof though.

woke up happy af, obsession is beautiful
